name: Soft Pop Plumping Cream Blush Veil
about: What it is:A weightless cream blush that is made with hyaluronic acid to hydrate and plump skin with a sheer veil of color..Coverage:Light.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Plumps and hydrates skin with a volumizing effect..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It  is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This sheer formula is made with hyaluronic acid to plump and hydrate while enhancing cheeks with a dewy finish. The noncomedogenic blush grips the skin while pearlescent pigments create a luminous finish for the perfect ‚Äòno-makeup makeup‚Äô effect.
ingredients: C15-19 Alkane, Octyldodecanol, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Synthetic Wax, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina, Mica, Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax/Oryza Sativa Bran Cera, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tin Oxide, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract. May contain/peut contenir (+/-): titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492), red 6 (ci 15850), red 28 lake (ci 45410).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply the Soft Pop Plumping Blush Veil over the SoftSculpt‚Ñ¢ Transforming Skin Enhancer (sold separately) or your favorite base for a warm, dewy look. .-Work the F1 Brush until hairs are evenly coated, then apply onto the apples of the cheeks, blending up towards the temple. Apply with fingertips for an even more natural effect...Pro Tip: .-Apply the Soft Pop Plumping Blush Veil over your favorite setting powder for a luminous last step or set it with Soft Pop Powder Blush for a full-coverage finish. .-Dab onto lips for a monochromatic pop of color.
